entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 2 May 2023
